00050 bool IOHandlerDatagram::handle_event(struct epoll_event *event) {
00051   int error;
00052 
00053   //DisplayEvent(event);
00054 
00055   if (event->events & EPOLLOUT) {
00056     if ((error = handle_write_readiness()) != Error::OK) {
00057       deliver_event(new Event(Event::ERROR, m_addr, error));
00058       return true;
00059     }
00060   }
00061 
00062   if (event->events & EPOLLIN) {
00063     ssize_t nread, payload_len;
00064     struct sockaddr_in addr;
00065     socklen_t fromlen = sizeof(struct sockaddr_in);
00066 
00067     while ((nread = FileUtils::recvfrom(m_sd, m_message, 65536,
00068             (struct sockaddr *)&addr, &fromlen)) != (ssize_t)-1) {
00069 
00070       Event *event = new Event(Event::MESSAGE, addr, Error::OK);
00071 
00072       event->load_header(m_sd, m_message, (size_t)m_message[1]);
00073 
00074       payload_len = nread - (ssize_t)event->header.header_len;
00075       event->payload_len = payload_len;
00076       event->payload = new uint8_t [payload_len];
00077       memcpy((void *)event->payload, m_message + event->header.header_len,
00078              payload_len);
00079       deliver_event( event );
00080       fromlen = sizeof(struct sockaddr_in);
00081     }
00082 
00083     if (errno != EAGAIN) {
00084       HT_ERRORF("FileUtils::recvfrom(%d) failure : %s", m_sd, strerror(errno));
00085       deliver_event(new Event(Event::ERROR, addr,
00086                               Error::COMM_RECEIVE_ERROR));
00087       return true;
00088     }
00089 
00090     return false;
00091   }
00092 
00093   if (event->events & EPOLLERR) {
00094     HT_WARN_OUT << "Received EPOLLERR on descriptor " << m_sd << " ("
00095                 << m_addr.format() << ")" << HT_END;
00096     deliver_event(new Event(Event::ERROR, m_addr, Error::COMM_POLL_ERROR));
00097     return true;
00098   }
00099 
00100   return false;
00101 }

00108 bool IOHandlerDatagram::handle_event(struct kevent *event) {
00109   int error;
00110 
00111   //DisplayEvent(event);
00112 
00113   assert(m_sd == (int)event->ident);
00114 
00115   assert((event->flags & EV_EOF) == 0);
00116 
00117   if (event->filter == EVFILT_WRITE) {
00118     if ((error = handle_write_readiness()) != Error::OK) {
00119       deliver_event(new Event(Event::ERROR, m_addr, error));
00120       return true;
00121     }
00122   }
00123 
00124   if (event->filter == EVFILT_READ) {
00125     size_t available = (size_t)event->data;
00126     ssize_t nread, payload_len;
00127     struct sockaddr_in addr;
00128     socklen_t fromlen = sizeof(struct sockaddr_in);
00129 
00130     if ((nread = FileUtils::recvfrom(m_sd, m_message, 65536,
00131         (struct sockaddr *)&addr, &fromlen)) == (ssize_t)-1) {
00132       HT_ERRORF("FileUtils::recvfrom(%d, len=%d) failure : %s", m_sd,
00133                 (int)available, strerror(errno));
00134       deliver_event(new Event(Event::ERROR, addr,
00135                               Error::COMM_RECEIVE_ERROR));
00136       return true;
00137     }
00138 
00139     Event *event = new Event(Event::MESSAGE, addr, Error::OK);
00140 
00141     event->load_header(m_sd, m_message, (size_t)m_message[1]);
00142 
00143     payload_len = nread - (ssize_t)event->header.header_len;
00144     event->payload_len = payload_len;
00145     event->payload = new uint8_t [payload_len];
00146     memcpy((void *)event->payload, m_message + event->header.header_len,
00147            payload_len);
00148 
00149     deliver_event( event );
00150 
00151     return false;
00152   }
00153 
00154   return false;
00155 
00156 }

00162 int IOHandlerDatagram::handle_write_readiness() {
00163   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00164   int error;
00165 
00166   if ((error = flush_send_queue()) != Error::OK)
00167     return error;
00168 
00169   // is this necessary?
00170   if (m_send_queue.empty())
00171     remove_poll_interest(Reactor::WRITE_READY);
00172 
00173   return Error::OK;
00174 }

00178 int IOHandlerDatagram::send_message(struct sockaddr_in &addr, CommBufPtr &cbp) {
00179   ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00180   int error;
00181   bool initially_empty = m_send_queue.empty() ? true : false;
00182 
00183   HT_LOG_ENTER;
00184 
00185   //HT_INFOF("Pushing message destined for %s:%d onto send queue",
00186   //inet_ntoa(addr.sin_addr), ntohs(addr.sin_port));
00187 
00188   m_send_queue.push_back(SendRec(addr, cbp));
00189 
00190   if ((error = flush_send_queue()) != Error::OK)
00191     return error;
00192 
00193   if (initially_empty && !m_send_queue.empty()) {
00194     add_poll_interest(Reactor::WRITE_READY);
00195     //HT_INFO("Adding Write interest");
00196   }
00197   else if (!initially_empty && m_send_queue.empty()) {
00198     remove_poll_interest(Reactor::WRITE_READY);
00199     //HT_INFO("Removing Write interest");
00200   }
00201 
00202   return Error::OK;
00203 }
00204

00206 
00207 int IOHandlerDatagram::flush_send_queue() {
00208   ssize_t nsent, tosend;
00209 
00210   while (!m_send_queue.empty()) {
00211 
00212     SendRec &send_rec = m_send_queue.front();
00213 
00214     tosend = send_rec.second->data.size - (send_rec.second->data_ptr
00215                                            - send_rec.second->data.base);
00216     assert(tosend > 0);
00217     assert(send_rec.second->ext.base == 0);
00218 
00219     nsent = FileUtils::sendto(m_sd, send_rec.second->data_ptr, tosend,
00220                               (sockaddr *)&send_rec.first,
00221                               sizeof(struct sockaddr_in));
00222 
00223     if (nsent == (ssize_t)-1) {
00224       HT_WARNF("FileUtils::sendto(%d, len=%d, addr=%s:%d) failed : %s", m_sd,
00225                (int)tosend, inet_ntoa(send_rec.first.sin_addr),
00226                ntohs(send_rec.first.sin_port), strerror(errno));
00227       return Error::COMM_SEND_ERROR;
00228     }
00229     else if (nsent < tosend) {
00230       HT_WARNF("Only sent %d bytes", (int)nsent);
00231       if (nsent == 0)
00232         break;
00233       send_rec.second->data_ptr += nsent;
00234       break;
00235     }
00236 
00237     // buffer written successfully, now remove from queue (destroys buffer)
00238     m_send_queue.pop_front();
00239   }
00240 
00241   return Error::OK;
00242 }
